if(APPLE)
# for apple, force static build
  add_library (Refract STATIC ${SRCS})
else(APPLE)
# build shared library
  add_library (Refract SHARED ${SRCS})
endif(APPLE)

# install

INSTALL(TARGETS Refract
        DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib
       )
